text: I ne ustraivayte zasad na vsekh dorogakh, pugaya i otvrashchaya lyudey ot pryamogo puti Allakha. Takim obrazom, vy nasil'no stremites' iskrivit' put' tekh, kto uveroval i stremitsya k blagu i dobrodeyaniyam. Vspomnite, kak vas bylo malo, a Allakh vas umnozhil blagodarya chistote v otnoshenii k detyam, lyudyam i imushchestvu. Vspomnite, kakov byl konets tekh, kto rasprostranyal nechestiye, i dumayte ob etom
